messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name:  I will derive this data from the following paragraph: On May 3, DET. F. G. Powell was alerted about a series of shoplifting incidents at Midtown Mall. Key informants were Ms. Thompson, a store owner, and Mr. Rodriguez, mall security. FORWARD COPY TO: DETECTIVE DIVISION. INFORMANT DOCS. Lt. H. I. Stevens - OPERATIONS Det. Powell, Sr. .. INVESTIGATIONS. Detective J. K. Bryant and Detective L. M. Foster assisted. PETERSON 10:05 Shoplifting Ms. Thompson reported stolen jewelry, and Mr. Rodriguez provided security footage. Video. Technician Ray examined the tapes. CONTINUED FORWARD TO: DETECTIVE DIVISION 3- STATUS [CHECK ONE] Det. Powell Sr, Det. Bryant, Det. Foster OPERATIONS Lt. Stevens INFORMANT Rodriguez, Juan 15 Rose Street, Midtown, Arizona 171-660. 93385. PETERSON 10:05 Shoplifting By 12:15 PM, Detectives Powell, Bryant, and Foster, under Lieutenant Stevens' direction, identified a recurring suspect. Captain N. O. Wallace coordinated with store owners. Sergeant P. Q. Adams and Sergeant R. S. Brooks searched for the suspect in nearby areas. By 1:30 PM, the suspect was apprehended. FORWARD TO: DETECTIVE DIVISION 3- STATUS [CHECK ONE] Det. Powell Sr, Det. Bryant, Det. Foster OPERATIONS Lt. Stevens AFFIDAVIT - Shoplifting Report 1) Store Inventory 2) Witness Statements 3) F.I.R. 4) Security Tapes 5) Mall Entry Records (6) Other Details LINE UP INFO ASSISTANT CHIEF DEPUTY IN CHARGE T. Gray M.M.P.D. 22.70 P54 2479 Thompson, CLARA NAME: ADDRESS: TELEPHONE: 140-2771 DETECTIVE: F. POWELL ITEM: 54-5050- 99 CRIME: 10:05 IDENTIFICATION NUMBER 83020 - CONFIRMED Jane Doe DATE 11/25/23 FORWARD TO: DETECTIVE DIVISION CONTINUED.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: DET. F. G. Powell  Officer Context: On May 3, DET. F. G. Powell was alerted about a series of shoplifting incidents at Midtown Mall. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Lt. H. I. Stevens  Officer Context: Lt. H. I. Stevens - OPERATIONS Officer Role: Lieutenant Officer Name: Detective J. K. Bryant  Officer Context: Detective J. K. Bryant and Detective L. M. Foster assisted. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Detective L. M. Foster  Officer Context: Detective J. K. Bryant and Detective L. M. Foster assisted. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Technician Ray  Officer Context: Video. Technician Ray examined the tapes. Officer Role: Technician Officer Name: Detective Powell  Officer Context: By 12:15 PM, Detectives Powell, Bryant, and Foster, under Lieutenant Stevens' direction, identified a recurring suspect. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Detective Bryant  Officer Context: By 12:15 PM, Detectives Powell, Bryant, and Foster, under Lieutenant Stevens' direction, identified a recurring suspect. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Detective Foster  Officer Context: By 12:15 PM, Detectives Powell, Bryant, and Foster, under Lieutenant Stevens' direction, identified a recurring suspect. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Captain N. O. Wallace  Officer Context: Captain N. O. Wallace coordinated with store owners. Officer Role: Captain Officer Name: Sergeant P. Q. Adams  Officer Context: Sergeant P. Q. Adams and Sergeant R. S. Brooks searched for the suspect in nearby areas. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: Sergeant R. S. Brooks Officer Context: Sergeant P. Q. Adams and Sergeant R. S. Brooks searched for the suspect in nearby areas. Officer Role: Sergeant
